pages.name: Pumpkin
pages.text: A depiction of a fully grown pumpkin crop.

pages.title: Seeds
pages.text: Pumpkin seeds seem to only be found in villages far away from where my journey began.

pages.title: Crop
pages.text: Once harvested pumpkin can be processed in many different ways. The following pages are all the products I have been able to produce from pumpkins.
